attributes.review: Hello, I am writing this review from my daughterâ€™s phone. Today, I walked into her room to check on her and found her dead. In her hand was her phone. I looked on it and found this horrible app open. Open on the app was what can only be described as a orange monstrosity of a man. He was advertising his support for racist, homophobic, xenophobic, transphobic, and many more awful groups. I finally noticed that I recognized the â€œmanâ€- it was our very own president! The man who was supposed to be good for our country, sent from God himself. But God preached love thy neighbor, and this Cheeto of a boy only preaches hate and discrimination. My daughter was very against him, and when we had an autopsy done, it was revealed she died of revulsion, horror, and sadness. It is presumed this app caused it, especially since it was endorsing the man-child called the president. He and his administration better pay for her funeral seeing he is the direct cause.
